string-array.name: enroll_step_failed_new
string-array.item: "Couldn't hear you. Can you say it louder?"
"Looks like it's too noisy here. Can you move to a quieter place and repeat that?"
"Couldn't catch that. Can you say it again?"
"Something went wrong. Can you move to a quieter place and repeat that?"
"Couldn't hear you. Can you clear the microphone or say it louder?"
"That was too loud. Could you repeat that a bit quieter?"
"The phrase you're saying doesn't match the greeting. Try saying it louder and clearer."
Check your network settings and try again
